snippet: The inspiration for Christian Siriano's fall collection was bats. Specifically, it was "The Vampire Bat," a film from the 1930s.
abstract: The inspiration for Christian Siriano's fall collection was bats. Specifically, it was "The Vampire Bat," a film from the 1930s.
lead_paragraph: The inspiration for Christian Siriano's fall collection was bats. Specifically, it was "The Vampire Bat," a film from the 1930s. Mr. Siriano explained this to me during an interview for the cover story in this week's Thursday Styles, in which he described the pressure of trying to appeal to fashion critics, who are looking for big ideas in his shows, and to his customers, who tend to want something pleasing to wear.

headline.main: Siriano Finds Subtle Inspiration in Bats
